participant_1.background:
I am a caring individual who wants to help others, but I am afraid that I will not be able to live up to my own expectations.
i love the tigers baseball team.
i am an artist and create with my mind and my hands.
I've been at sea for too long and miss my pets.
my grandparents are dead.

participant_2.background:
I wash my uniforms every week because I work at an animal clinic.
i am a cat owner.
I want to learn how to let things go and not be so hard on myself.
My eyes are too weak to see the world clearly, but my bones are strong enough to withstand a beating.
I'm afraid of my mom coming back into my life and ruining my new life.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well. How are you today?
I'm doing well! I'm just an artist that loves to create with my mind and my hands.
That sounds wonderful! I'm an animal lover and work at an animal clinic.
I love animals! I have a pet cat.
Aww! I have two cats and a dog.
That's so cute! I miss my pets back home.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you get to see them soon.
Thank you. What do you do for fun?
I love to read and spend time with my animals.
That sounds like a great way to spend your free time. What kinds of books do you like to read?
I love to read anything, but I especially enjoy mystery and suspense novels.
Oh that's a great genre! I really enjoy reading fantasy novels.
I've never been much of a fan of fantasy, but I could see why it's so popular.
